analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0x15c2f2ef00b2fc24461e56e26f1166d2cead7ac9.sol:
	Contract SMT has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x15c2f2ef00b2fc24461e56e26f1166d2cead7ac9.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/20/0x15c2f2ef00b2fc24461e56e26f1166d2cead7ac9.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
